subject: Re: Breakthru College - Website Technical Improvements

full_threads.body:
Scores are looking much better, thanks so much Joel. I'll go back to the SEO guys and see if they want anything else.

Regards,

Joshua Cook​​​​

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

T 1800 767 212

I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Joshua,

I hope all is well.

We have update the site. We have adjusted the cache wprocket settings and divi performance settings (I had a quick glance of the site).
https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-www-breakthrucollege-edu-au/e7v25emmag?form_factor=desktop

Can you try and check now?

Hey Joel,

I've just run another report and it looks like we've actually gone backwards. Unsure what has caused this or if it's a timing thing. Are you able to look into this for me again and let me know if there any improvements I could be making in my end as well?

Cheers,

Joshua Cook​​​​

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

T 1800 767 212


|

M 0490 305 252


|

Level 2, 689 Ann Street Fortitude Valley Queensland 4006

breakthru.org.au





I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Joshua,

We have made the following updates to the site:
  • Sitemap: The sitemap has been updated.
  • Performance Optimization: We have enabled WP Rocket to cache the website, which should help improve load times. Additionally, we are currently running image optimization to further enhance performance.

Could you please run an SEO check now and let me know if this works for you?

https://www.breakthrucollege.edu.au/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Tier 3** workflow

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,

Please see below from our SEO team. Can you please look at:
  • Sitemap issues: Can you please try to replicate and let me know if there are any conflicts based on the error provided?
  • LCP and FCP stats: Our Lighthouse report is showing we're not performing fantastic on these metrics. They have suggest loading JS in the footer, if you can look at any load speed optimisations we can make for the website please. Preferably we need all/most of our lighthouse metrics in the green. I think we're seeing issues particularly on mobile but could use a bump on desktop if possible as well.

Regards,

Joshua Cook​​​​

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

T 1800 767 212

|

M 0490 305 252

|

From: Jarryd Panayi <Jarryd@practiceedge.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 7 March 2025 11:42
To: Joshua Cook <Joshua.Cook@breakthru.org.au>
Cc: Disura Wellappili <disura@practiceedge.com.au>
Subject: March Meeting Follow-Up - Technical Items

CAUTION - EXTERNAL E-MAIL Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the source of this email and know the content is safe.
Hey Josh,

Just following up on some of the technical items for your SEO campaigns as discussed this morning..

Breakthru College sitemap issue
  • This is the issue I have seen when trying to load the sitemap on Breakthru College from time to time... It's temperamental, so it's hard to replicate which is annoying, but I got a screenshot of a time that it happened which may help. I'll keep trying to replicate the issue and get it on a Loom, but for now this is all I've got.
  • If it looks like Yoast is conflicting with something and we need to change plugins, we can try RankMath and see if that solves the issue.
Breakthru page speed optimisations
  • LCP and FCP were flagged as a bit of an issue so I had our dev look into ways to improve this, he said it seems most of the issues are caused by the JavaScript
  • He said loading the JS in the footer might help reduce the LCP and FCP, and the LCP needs to be in the green if possible, is this something you can pass onto your dev team?
Cheers! 🙂

Book time to meet with me

Jarryd Panayi
 SEO Specialist

 P: (03) 8418 8055
 E: Jarryd@practiceedge.com.au
